exampleEn: The new terminal can accommodate 10 million passengers annually.
exampleKo: 새 터미널은 연간 1천만 명의 승객을 수용할 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: The hotel is adjacent to the main train station.
The new subway line will alleviate traffic congestion.
exampleKo: 새 지하철 노선이 교통 체증을 완화할 것입니다.

exampleEn: We anticipate heavy traffic during the holiday season.
exampleKo: 우리는 휴가철 동안 심한 교통 체증을 예상합니다.

exampleEn: The new road will bypass the city center.
Shuttle buses circulate between terminals every 15 minutes.
Boarding will commence at 2:30 PM.
All vehicles must comply with emission standards.
exampleKo: 모든 차량은 배출 기준을 준수해야 합니다.

exampleEn: The downtown area is heavily congested during rush hour.
exampleKo: 도심 지역은 러시아워 동안 매우 혼잡합니다.

exampleEn: The flight was delayed for three consecutive days.
The city plans to consolidate bus routes.
The transportation corridor connects major cities.
Bad weather curtailed flight operations.
The departure was deferred until further notice.
exampleKo: 출발은 추후 공지가 있을 때까지 연기되었습니다.

exampleEn: This area is designated for loading and unloading only.
exampleKo: 이 구역은 적재 및 하역 전용으로 지정되어 있습니다.

exampleEn: Road conditions deteriorated due to heavy rain.
Passengers will disembark through the rear door.
The strike caused major disruptions to train services.
exampleKo: 파업으로 기차 서비스에 큰 중단이 발생했습니다.

exampleEn: The flight was diverted to an alternate airport.
The flight duration is approximately 12 hours.
The new traffic system is more efficient.
The embarkation process takes about 30 minutes.
The upgrade will enhance passenger comfort.
We will expedite the customs clearance process.
exampleKo: 우리는 세관 통관 절차를 신속히 처리하겠습니다.

exampleEn: The new system facilitates faster boarding.
exampleKo: 새 시스템이 더 빠른 탑승을 용이하게 합니다.

exampleEn: Peak-hour fares are 20% higher than off-peak rates.
exampleKo: 피크 시간 요금은 비수기 요금보다 20% 높습니다.

exampleEn: The proposed route expansion is financially feasible.
exampleKo: 제안된 노선 확장은 재정적으로 실행 가능합니다.

exampleEn: Airfares fluctuate depending on the season.
The company specializes in freight transportation.
The airport serves as a major international hub.
exampleKo: 공항은 주요 국제 허브 역할을 합니다.

exampleEn: The city will implement new parking regulations.
exampleKo: 시는 새로운 주차 규정을 시행할 것입니다.

exampleEn: Construction work may impede traffic flow.
exampleKo: 공사 작업이 교통 흐름을 방해할 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: The government is investing in transportation infrastructure.
exampleKo: 정부는 교통 기반 시설에 투자하고 있습니다.

exampleEn: Expect intermittent delays due to track maintenance.
exampleKo: 선로 유지보수로 인한 간헐적인 지연이 예상됩니다.

exampleEn: Please confirm your travel itinerary by email.
The company handles all shipping logistics.
Seatbelt use is mandatory on all flights.
The captain navigated through the storm safely.
The GPS calculates the optimal route.
The new bridge includes a pedestrian walkway.
exampleKo: 새 다리에는 보행자 통로가 포함되어 있습니다.

exampleEn: The departure has been postponed until tomorrow.
Safety precautions must be followed at all times.
exampleKo: 안전 예방 조치는 항상 준수되어야 합니다.

exampleEn: Cars are the predominant mode of transportation.
Preliminary reports indicate no major damage.
exampleKo: 예비 보고서는 큰 피해가 없음을 나타냅니다.

exampleEn: Traffic jams are prevalent during peak hours.
exampleKo: 교통 체증은 피크 시간대에 널리 퍼져 있습니다.

exampleEn: The airline prioritizes passenger safety.
Smoking is prohibited on all flights.
We appreciate your prompt response.
The hotel's proximity to the airport is convenient.
The train service is remarkably punctual.
The government regulates airline safety standards.
The bus terminal will relocate to a new site.
exampleKo: 버스 터미널이 새로운 장소로 이전할 것입니다.

exampleEn: The city is seeking a remedy for traffic congestion.
exampleKo: 시는 교통 체증에 대한 해결책을 찾고 있습니다.

exampleEn: The station will be renovated next year.
Train services will resume at 6 AM.
The airline has added three new international routes.
The transfer process was seamless and efficient.
The new system will streamline check-in procedures.
exampleKo: 새 시스템이 체크인 절차를 간소화할 것입니다.

exampleEn: Subsequent flights were also delayed.
There was a substantial increase in passenger numbers.
Bus services were suspended due to the strike.
The new terminal opened last month.
The city is expanding its public transit network.
The airport will undergo major renovations.
Passengers can utilize the free Wi-Fi service.
exampleKo: 승객들은 무료 Wi-Fi 서비스를 활용할 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: Electric buses are a viable alternative.
There are several hotels in the vicinity of the airport.
The situation warrants immediate action.
